titles.title: To provide for the display of the flag commemorating the 50th Anniversary of World War II in the rotunda of the Capitol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.

bill.summary: 2/23/1993--Introduced. Requires the Architect of the Capitol to display the flag commemorating the 50th Anniversary of World War II in the rotunda of the Capitol until November 11, 1995.
